howtowork.title: Contact Participant
howtowork.description: Reach out to the participant to schedule a meeting.

howtowork.title: Participant Agrees
howtowork.description: Confirm the participant’s availability and agreement to meet.

howtowork.title: Meet Participant
howtowork.description: Arrange and attend the meeting at the agreed location.

howtowork.title: Understand Requirements:
howtowork.description: Discuss and understand the participant’s needs and requirements.

howtowork.title: Agree on Service, Time, and Prices
howtowork.description: Negotiate and agree on the services to be provided, the timeline, and the pricing.

howtowork.title: Draft Service Agreement
howtowork.description: Prepare a detailed service agreement based on the discussions.

howtowork.title: Send Agreement for Signature
howtowork.description: Send the drafted agreement to the participant for their signature.

howtowork.title: Receive Signed Agreement
howtowork.description: Collect the signed agreement from the participant.
